document: DDT RESIDUES IN COASTAL MARINE PHYTOPLANKTON AND THEIR TRANSFER IN PELAGIC FOOD CHAINS A DISSERTATION SUBMITTED TO THE DEPARTMENT OF BIOLOGICAL SCIENCES AND THE COMMITTEE ON GRADUATE STUDIES OF STANFORD UNIVERSITY IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY By James Leslie Cox June 1971 Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner.
